org.jamwiki.parser

Class LinkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.parser.LinkUtil

  • public abstract class LinkUtil
extends Object
    General utility methods for handling both wiki topic links and HTML links. Wiki topic links are generally of the form "Topic?query=param#Section". HTML links are of the form http://example.com/.

    • Method Detail

      • appendQueryParam

        public static String appendQueryParam(String query,
                                      String param,
                                      String value)
        Build a query parameter. If root is empty, this method returns "?param=value". If root is not empty this method returns root + "&param=value". Note that param and value will be URL encoded, and if "query" does not start with a "?" then one will be pre-pended.
        Parameters:
        query - The existing query parameter, if one is available. If the query parameter does not start with "?" then one will be pre-pended.
        param - The name of the query parameter being appended. This value will be URL encoded.
        value - The value of the query parameter being appended. This value will be URL encoded.
        Returns:
        The full query string generated using the input parameters.

      • buildAnchorText

        public static String buildAnchorText(String text)
        Convert plain text into a value suitable for an anchor name. The HTML rules for such a value is that it must begin with a letter ([A-Za-z]) and may be followed by any number of letters, digits ([0-9]), hyphens ("-"), underscores ("_"), colons (":"), and periods (".").

      • buildEditLinkUrl

        public static String buildEditLinkUrl(String context,
                                      String virtualWiki,
                                      String topic,
                                      String query,
                                      int section)
                               throws DataAccessException
        Utility method for building a URL link to a wiki edit page for a specified topic.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context for the link that is being created.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the link that is being created.
        topic - The name of the topic for which an edit link is being created.
        query - Any existing query parameters to append to the edit link. This value may be either null or empty.
        section - The section defined by the name parameter within the HTML page for the topic being edited. If provided then the edit link will allow editing of only the specified section.
        Returns:
        A url that links to the edit page for the specified topic. Note that this method returns only the URL, not a fully-formed HTML anchor tag.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while builing the link URL.

      • buildExternalLinkHtml

        public static String buildExternalLinkHtml(String link,
                                           String cssClass,
                                           String linkText)
                                    throws ParserException
        Parse a link of the form http://example.com and return the opening tag of the form <a href="http://example.com">.
        Throws:
        ParserException

      • buildInternalLinkHtml

        public static String buildInternalLinkHtml(WikiLink wikiLink,
                                           String text,
                                           String style,
                                           String target,
                                           boolean escapeHtml)
                                    throws DataAccessException
        Build the HTML anchor link to a topic page for a given WikLink object.
        Parameters:
        wikiLink - The WikiLink object for which an HTML link is being generated.
        text - The text to display as the link content.
        style - The CSS class to use with the anchor HTML tag. This value can be null or empty if no custom style is used.
        target - The anchor link target, or null or empty if no target is needed.
        escapeHtml - Set to true if the link caption should be HTML escaped. This value should be true in any case where the caption is not guaranteed to be free from potentially malicious HTML code.
        Returns:
        An HTML anchor link that matches the given input parameters.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving topic information.

      • buildTopicUrl

        public static String buildTopicUrl(WikiLink wikiLink)
                            throws DataAccessException
        Build a URL to the topic page for a given topic. This method performs additional processing beyond what WikiLink.toRelativeUrl() does, including returning upload or edit URLs for non-existent images/topics, handling minor variations in case-sensitivity, etc.
        Parameters:
        wikiLink - The WikiLink object containing all relevant information about the link being generated.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving topic information.

      • extractCommentsLink

        public static String extractCommentsLink(String virtualWiki,
                                         String name)
        Given an article name, return the appropriate comments topic article name. For example, if the article name is "Topic" then the return value is "Comments:Topic".
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The current virtual wiki.
        name - The article name from which a comments article name is to be constructed.
        Returns:
        The comments article name for the article name.

      • extractTopicLink

        public static String extractTopicLink(String virtualWiki,
                                      String name)
        Given an article name, extract an appropriate topic article name. For example, if the article name is "Comments:Topic" then the return value is "Topic".
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The current virtual wiki.
        name - The article name from which a topic article name is to be constructed.
        Returns:
        The topic article name for the article name.

      • findRedirectedTopic

        public static Topic findRedirectedTopic(Topic parent,
                                        int attempts)
                                 throws DataAccessException
        Given a topic, if that topic is a redirect find the target topic of the redirection.
        Parameters:
        parent - The topic being queried. If this topic is a redirect then the redirect target will be returned, otherwise the topic itself is returned.
        attempts - The maximum number of child topics to follow. This parameter prevents infinite loops if topics redirect back to one another.
        Returns:
        If the parent topic is a redirect then this method returns the target topic that is being redirected to, otherwise the parent topic is returned.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving data.

      • interwiki

        public static String interwiki(WikiLink wikiLink)
                        throws ParserException
        Generate the HTML for an interwiki anchor link.
        Parameters:
        wikiLink - The WikiLink object containing all relevant information about the link being generated.
        Returns:
        The HTML anchor tag for the interwiki link, or null if there is no interwiki link defined for the WikiLink.
        Throws:
        ParserException

      • isCommentsPage

        public static boolean isCommentsPage(String virtualWiki,
                                     String topicName)
        Given a topic name, determine if that name corresponds to a comments page.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The current virtual wiki.
        topicName - The topic name (non-null) to examine to determine if it is a comments page or not.
        Returns:
        true if the page is a comments page, false otherwise.

      • isExistingArticle

        public static String isExistingArticle(String virtualWiki,
                                       String articleName)
                                throws DataAccessException
        Utility method for determining if an article name corresponds to a valid wiki link. In this case an "article name" could be an existing topic, a "Special:" page, a user page, an interwiki link, etc. This method will return the article name if the given name corresponds to a valid special page, user page, topic, or other existing article, or null if no valid article exists.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic being checked.
        articleName - The name of the article that is being checked.
        Returns:
        The article name if the given name and virtual wiki correspond to a valid special page, user page, topic, or other existing article, or null if no valid article exists.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if an error occurs during lookup.

      • prefixPosition

        protected static int prefixPosition(String topicName)

      • normalize

        public static String normalize(String url)
        Make sure a URL does not contain any extraneous characters such as "//" in places where it should not.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to be normalized.
        Returns:
        The normalized URL.

      • parseWikiLink

        public static WikiLink parseWikiLink(String contextPath,
                                     String virtualWiki,
                                     String raw)
        Parse a wiki topic link and return a WikiLink object representing the link. Wiki topic links are of the form "Topic?Query#Section".
        Parameters:
        contextPath - The servlet context path.
        virtualWiki - The current virtual wiki.
        raw - The raw topic link text.
        Returns:
        A WikiLink object that represents the link.

      • retrieveTopicNamespace

        public static Namespace retrieveTopicNamespace(String virtualWiki,
                                               String topicName)
        Utility method for determining a topic namespace given a topic name. This method accepts ONLY the topic name - if the topic name is prefixed with a virtual wiki, interwiki, or other value then it will not return the proper namespace.

      • retrieveTopicPageName

        public static String retrieveTopicPageName(Namespace namespace,
                                           String virtualWiki,
                                           String topicName)
        Utility method for determining a topic's page name given its namespace and full topic name.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace for the topic name.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic.
        topicName - The full topic name that is being split.
        Returns:
        The pageName portion of the topic name. If the topic is "Comments:Main Page" then the page name is "Main Page".

      • validateTopicName

        public static void validateTopicName(String virtualWiki,
                                     String name,
                                     boolean allowSpecial)
                              throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a topic name is valid for use on the Wiki, meaning that it is not empty and does not contain any invalid characters.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The current virtual wiki.
        name - The topic name to validate.
        allowSpecial - Set to true if topics in the Special: namespace should be considered valid. These topics cannot be created, so (for example) this method should not allow them when editing topics.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the topic name is invalid.

      • validateTopicName

        public static void validateTopicName(WikiLink wikiLink,
                                     boolean allowSpecial)
                              throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a topic name is valid for use on the Wiki, meaning that it is not empty and does not contain any invalid characters. This method offers improved performance for cases where a WikiLink object is already available.
        Parameters:
        wikiLink - The WikiLink object to validate.
        allowSpecial - Set to true if topics in the Special: namespace should be considered valid. These topics cannot be created, so (for example) this method should not allow them when editing topics.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the topic name is invalid.
